name: react js assignment
subject: Technical Assessment of {{technology}
body:
Dear {{candidateName}},

name: offer letter template
subject: Your Offer from Gokuldham Society In {{position}}
body:
Dear {{candidateName}},

We are pleased to extend you an offer for the position of {{position}} at our company. Your starting date will be {{startDate}}, and your annual salary will be {{salary}}. Please confirm your acceptance of this offer by replying to this email before {{responseDeadline}}.
We look forward to having you on our team!
Sincerely,
Gokuldham Society

name: rejection template
subject: Application Status ‚Äì {{technology}} At GokulDham Society
body:
Dear {{candidateName}},

Thank you for your interest in the {{technology}} position at our company and for the time you invested in the application process.

After reviewing your profile and carefully considering your qualifications, we regret to inform you that we have decided to move forward with another candidate for this role.

Please know that this decision was not a reflection of your skills or potential. We received many strong applications and had to make some very difficult choices.

We appreciate your effort and encourage you to apply for future openings that align with your experience and goals.

Wishing you the very best in your career ahead.
Sincerely,
Gokhuldham Society

name: hired confirmation template
subject: You're Hired! Welcome to the {{position}} Team
body:
Dear {{candidateName}}, We are thrilled to inform you that you have been officially selected for the position of {{position}}. Congratulations and welcome to the team!
We will be sharing your onboarding schedule and additional documents soon. Your start date is scheduled for {{startDate}}.
Should you have any questions before then, feel free to reach out.
Once again, welcome and we look forward to your journey with us.
Best regards,
Gokuldham Society
